meanings.definition: The study of rocks and their formation.
meanings.sent1: Geologists use lithologies to understand how rocks are made.
meanings.sent2: The scientist examined the lithologies of the mountain range.
meanings.sent3: The lithologies in the textbook made the student sleepy.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of diverse lithologies, each telling a unique story.
meanings.sent5: The lithologies in the museum exhibit were colorful and fascinating.

meanings.definition: The characteristics of rocks in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The geologist analyzed the lithologies of the desert region.
meanings.sent2: Different lithologies can be found in various parts of the world.
meanings.sent3: The lithologies of the beach made it a popular spot for rock collectors.
meanings.sent4: His face showed the lithologies of a hard life lived in the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The lithologies of the canyon walls were breathtaking in their beauty.
